ody and Virgo shot it down, sending sparkles into the sky. Bronze assumed t=
he obvious, that White was indeed dead Jim...Lee and Barrymore continued wi=
th their brutal beating on Brown and Pink. Bronze didn't notice that Virgo =
aimed a gun at him. She fired a dart into Bronze's chest.

dart releases something inside of Bronze before he pulls it out. He goes ba=
ck into the base to tell Hazel the latest news on White...
